md:
giải nghĩa từ "wave" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Wave (noun) - Sóng
	* Meaning: A movement of the sea or a lake that goes up and down, often caused by wind.
	* Example: The big wave crashed against the shore.
	* Related words: ripple, tide, surf, ocean
2. Wave (verb) - Đánh tay chào
	* Meaning: To move your hand up and down to greet someone or to say goodbye.
	* Example: She waved at me from across the room.
	* Related words: gesture, salute, beckon, signal
3. Wave (physics) - Sóng (vật lý)
	* Meaning: A disturbance that travels through a medium, such as water or air, and transfers energy from one point to another.
	* Example: The wave function describes the behavior of particles in quantum mechanics.
	* Related words: frequency, amplitude, wavelength, oscillation
4. Wave (fashion) - Kiểu tóc sóng
	* Meaning: A hairstyle that has a wavy or curved shape.
	* Example: She got a wave perm to add some texture to her hair.
	* Related words: curl, straight, bob, afro

Note: The meanings and examples provided are just a few of the many possible interpretations of the word "wave".
html:
giải nghĩa từ "wave" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Wave (noun) - Sóng
    • Meaning: A movement of the sea or a lake that goes up and down, often caused by wind.
    • Example: The big wave crashed against the shore.
    • Related words: ripple, tide, surf, ocean
  2. Wave (verb) - Đánh tay chào
    • Meaning: To move your hand up and down to greet someone or to say goodbye.
    • Example: She waved at me from across the room.
    • Related words: gesture, salute, beckon, signal
  3. Wave (physics) - Sóng (vật lý)
    • Meaning: A disturbance that travels through a medium, such as water or air, and transfers energy from one point to another.
    • Example: The wave function describes the behavior of particles in quantum mechanics.
    • Related words: frequency, amplitude, wavelength, oscillation
  4. Wave (fashion) - Kiểu tóc sóng
    • Meaning: A hairstyle that has a wavy or curved shape.
    • Example: She got a wave perm to add some texture to her hair.
    • Related words: curl, straight, bob, afro

Note: The meanings and examples provided are just a few of the many possible interpretations of the word "wave".
